author: jonaburg
content: hi guys, not sure wher eto ask this, i seemed to have corrupted my eth DB when a sync connectivity issue occured.. is there a clean/fast way to resync geth?

author: jonaburg
content: what is the difference of `geth removedb` and rm -rf the chaindata dir?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: `geth removedb` does not remove the ancient blocks, you could do `rm -rf chaindata/*.ldb`

author: jlokier
content:
> "not sure where to ask this"
There's a Geth Discord server if you have more questions about it. https://discord.gg/4T4nx26z
